content: Can someone on compiler team start an FCP to merge for #93913. It seems like the "safe" option, versus just a merge.
it's only natural that pnkfelix would refuse to check his box, since everybody_loops is his baby :cry: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/commit/41def27bda80eb5e1b3bfa75d34fd4f9e31e0988
this may be the thing that pushes me over the edge to figure out how to work with creduce or friends to accomplish my goal(s)
